Glucose.description: Plasma glucose concentration a 2 hours in an oral glucose tolerance test (mg/dL)

BMI.description: Body mass index (weight in kg/(height in m)^2)

DiabetesPedigreeFunction.description: Diabetes pedigree function (a function which scores likelihood of diabetes based on family history)

Outcome.description: Class variable (0 or 1) where 0 indicates that the person is not diabetic and 1 indicates that the person is diabetic

value_dict.1: Indicates that the person is diabetic
value_dict.0: Indicates that the person is not diabetic

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in medical data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the health indicators of the patient, please predict whether the patient has diabetes or not.

class_value_dict.1: Indicates that the person is diabetic
class_value_dict.0: Indicates that the person is not diabetic

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in medical data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the health indicators of the patient, please predict the glucose level of the patient.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in medical data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the health indicators of the patient, please predict the Body Mass Index (BMI) of the patient.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in medical data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the health indicators of the patient, please predict the age of the patient.
